title: Evolving cyber attacks are threatening the grid, but a new era of security monitoring has arrived
description: Fortinet hosted a webcast on cybersecurity for utilities, discussing NERC CIP-015-1 requirements and the need for enhanced network security.
content: Fortinet hosted a webcast on cybersecurity for utilities, discussing NERC CIP-015-1 requirements and the need for enhanced network security.
